# GitHub Actions Status Badges

Add these badges to your README.md to show the CI/CD pipeline status:

## Build Status Badge

```markdown
[![CI/CD Pipeline](https://github.com/yusuuf-mm/HabitOS/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/yusuuf-mm/HabitOS/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml)
```

**Rendered:**

[![CI/CD Pipeline](https://github.com/yusuuf-mm/HabitOS/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/yusuuf-mm/HabitOS/actions/workflows/ci-cd.yml)

---

## Suggested README Placement

Add the badge near the top of your README.md with your other badges:

```markdown
# üéØ HabitOS: AI-Driven Behavioral Optimization Platform

<div align="center">

```
